info.name: Moroccan Moolah
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.
Graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
* Sand background: https://www.freepik.com/free-photo/sand-surface-texture-beige-background-zen-peace-concept_17223843.htm
* Tree: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/green-leaves-cartoon-style-white-background_16265335.htm
* Diamond Square Puzzle: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/diamond-square-puzzle_392949277.htm
* Border Wall: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/flat-design-greek-border-set_22062347.htm
* Circle: https://www.freepik.com/icon/record_3926263
* Triangle: https://www.freepik.com/icon/play-button_3926253
* Square: https://www.freepik.com/icon/stop_3926272
* Hexagon: https://www.freepik.com/icon/badge_17226885
info.description: Buy the best shop locations and attract customers at the Moroccan marketplace, working together with (or backstabbing) fellow shop owners to make money!
info.similarAwards:
2003 Kinderspielexperten "8-to-13-year-olds" Nominee
1996 Meeples Choice Award Nominee
info.helpText:
Some notes on various implementation features:
* To indicate which shop is being auctioned, drag the auction chip to the appropriate shop on the board
* To indicate shop ownership after an auction, drag your player chip to the appropriate shop on the board
* To move customers around, manually drag-and-drop from holder to holder

* Any auctioneer cuts or mover cuts must be calculated and entered manually by the players involved

* Reset Game provides you an option to use slightly more automated customer movement (clicking on arrow buttons)

clickRoutine.note: Move the turn to the next player

label-text.text:
Turn Options:
 * move+move
 * move+auction
 * auction+auction

Income Per Customer:
 $(n x 100) with a maximum of $500
where n = # of customers in the shop

Mover's Cut:
$50 per customer (if owner profit <= $300)
$100 per customer (if owner profit > $300)

Auctioneer's Cut:
$100 (if winning bid <= $500)
$200 (if winning bid > $500)

clickRoutine: var result = ${num1} - ${num2} //You could also write this as var result = + ${num1} {num2}

fields.text: You're about to pay $${num2}. Are you sure?
